Installation
============

Install from PyPI (recommended):

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install climalysis

Install from GitHub (development version):

.. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/Climalysis/climalysis.git
    cd climalysis
    pip install .

Dependencies
------------

- Python >= 3.7
- numpy
- scikit-learn
- scipy
- statsmodels
- xarray

Install all dependencies:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install -r requirements.txt
